user_query: Can you create a mindmap to help me brainstorm and structure my ideas for starting a small business? I want to explore different business ideas and organize them into categories like market type, required skills, startup cost, and potential risks.
requirements: Focus on idea generation and evaluation
Include branches for: market segment, skill required, cost estimate, competition, and risk factors
Organize ideas based on type (e.g., product-based, service-based, online, offline)
